dungeonadventure.items

Class Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeonadventure.items.Item
      • dungeonadventure.items.Bomb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Inspectable, Nameable, Powerable, Threadable, Timeable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Bomb
extends Item
implements java.lang.Runnable, Powerable, Threadable, Timeable
    Bomb. Starts timer for exploding on spawn. Explosion is a game losing situation. Can be defused.
    Author:
    Mikko Piuhola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Add an bomb explosion observer to Bomb
        Parameters:
        obs - Object that will observe when the bomb will explode

      • powerOn

        public boolean powerOn()
        Bomb cannot be powered on. It automatically gets powered on on spawn and can only be defused.
        Specified by:
        powerOn in interface Powerable
        Returns:
        False to indicate forbidden method
